alert.note: Alert for Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 18 at 6:05PM PDT until July 18 at 10:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DRY AND BREEZY ACROSS THE SOUTHERN HALF OF FWZ604 TO THE SOUTH OF SALEM... ... ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHERN PORTIONS OF FIRE WEATHER ZONE 604... * AFFECTED AREA...In Oregon, the southern half of Fire Weather Zone 604 in the Willamette Valley south of Salem. * WINDS...North 5 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. Elevations above 300 feet will see the gustiest winds. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * IMPACTS...Conditions may be favorable for rapid fire spread which may threaten life and property. Use extra caution with potential ignition sources, especially in grassy areas. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of the above conditions can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
